channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25643|2024-08-28T14:10:23.264Z -- zte -- mc801a
item.description: There is a command injection vulnerability in some ZTE mobile internet products. Due to insufficient input validation of multiple network parameters, an authenticated attacker could use the vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-22069|2024-08-08T07:54:50.319Z -- zte -- zxv10%20xt802
item.description: There is a permission and access control vulnerability of ZTE's ZXV10 XT802/ET301 product.Attackers with common permissions can log in the terminal web and change the password of the administrator illegally by intercepting requests to change the passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-08-01T22:35:34.708Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-20T06:20:44.058Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-06-04T17:52:44.293Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-26T20:10:48.349Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22069|2024-08-08T13:07:14.051Z -- zte -- zxv10%20xt802
item.description: There is a permission and access control vulnerability of ZTE's ZXV10 XT802/ET301 product.Attackers with common permissions can log in the terminal web and change the password of the administrator illegally by intercepting requests to change the passwords.
